DOC.brief_summary: The specific aim trial determine hydrodistention time intradetrusor injection botulinum toxin A additional benefit patient refractory overactive bladder ( OAB ) urgency symptom compare intradetrusor injection botulinum toxin A alone . Consented patient randomize hydrodistention pressure 80 cm H2O 5 minute , prior intradetrusor injection 100 unit botulinum toxin A ( hydrodistention group ) intradetrusor injection 100 unit botulinum toxin A alone ( botulinum toxin A alone group ) .
